name: Jurassic Arena (NITZ!)
description:
OVERVIEW:

Jurassic arena is a 3 player game in which two amazonian warriors must defeat and evil dinosaur sorcerer who has the ability to summon hoards of dinosaurs.

MOBS:

There are 4 kinds of mobs that the dinosaur sorcerer can summon:

Raptors:

These dinosaurs, although fast, are relatively easy to kill.

Carnotaurus:


This dinosaur is similar to the raptor but is slower, larger, and has more HP, making it a scarier foe to face if it manages to get to you!

Stegosaurus:

The largest and strongest of the dinosaurs, the stegosaurus is also the slowest.

Dilophosaurus:

The Dilophosaurs are fast and small with low HP, making them easy to deal with for advanced players.
